header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Football, application form, problem children, baby birds in nest, cockerel, birthdays, 3D printing, houses, shabby workmanship, not sleeping

but they've got to score four goals

five to cancel out the away goal

yeah but if they score three and it's three then it's the same
if Barcelona score so it's four three
they've still got to score four because that way

are you watching it as well?
why not? cos I've got some work to do

that'll be interesting have you have you had any advice on what to write?
I'm just going to do the I wish to apply for this job cos it's an application form plus you've got to put a letter of why you want the job
there's loads of loads of reasons why isn't there?
there's loads of reasons why there's loads of reasons why I don't want the job as well
I think there's probably more reasons why I don't want the job than I do want the job
is it money wise? it is good money?
it'll be an extra seven thousand a year
well well that's a good reason innit?
it's more than a good reason at this time
it is more than a good reason at this time but I don't know what's going to happen I mean they interviewed today for erm jobs for a SENCO job

no I don't want a SENCO job not at our place
oh I see yeah of course yeah
oh mm that's quite hard isn't it?
every ev every student's got one
and if they haven't they're trying to get one
so what is special need cases like then?
they can be a they can be they can be anything they can be from dyslexia all the way from Asperger's
ADHD er DDD or whatever that is I made that one up
we weren't that a bug killer?
that's what they need you know I think that's what part of the problem
they are ah they are just at the moment they're just off the wall
that's weird innit? why is that? what are they being fed on?

I just dunno they're just off the wall this afternoon there was an exam and the exam started at one thirty and it was for an hour I think the I think it was for an hour and a half yeah it was for an hour and a half so one thirty-two thirty not only a hour maybe it was only a hour which meant that they would be ready for their last lesson
thirty of them this is year eleven decided that they weren't going to go to their last lesson they got out the building
because they were being told they could
right so you've got one person you've got two people saying you're staying in school until the end of the day

even though you have an exam because you've still got lessons to go to and then you've got the new head who has kind of said oh if they're fi if they've done their exam in the afternoon they can go home
nobody nobody is telling one person or the other person what's what
oh that's a bit bad innit
right? and then of course the students that haven't got exams
they want to go home as well
they want to go home cos it's not fair
so with my group this afternoon I got laptops and I got I said right you can go on Bitesize this afternoon cos they've got their exam this time next week
I said you can go on Bitesize and you will do some revision questions now I only had eight but pff two did it two did it no problem at all no real issues but the other six there was issues
one didn't do anything I'm not doing it it's not fair they've gone home I'm not doing it
you've got an exam next week yeah and so what?
well we never used to be able to talk like that to teacher's did we?
you know I really didn't feel like actually recording it now would I the thing is if I recorded it and then played it back to the senior team would I then get into trouble?
cos cos it's the cos it's then
you're supposed to have permission anyway to record if they give you permission they'd be fine won't they? but then I don't know
it's like should I should I you know should I put a camera on me and show the abuse that you have to put up with from some students
well there is a case for that
because in some er preschools and and not preschools nurseries they used to have the cameras on
so that the parents could see how they were behaving didn't they?
yeah cos there was a lot of trouble weren't they in some of these nurseries
cos there was a lot of trouble about it all in the nurseries
and er you know it was all about abuse and stuff like that wasn't it and things so they had they had the cameras I don't know if they still do it

but but I know you know having been at that higher position I know if you're in a high position even our senior managers the kids don't have any respect for them as such they push it and push it and push it and walk away from them
so as a classroom teacher you've got no chance
because they don't see you being a head of school or a vice principal or anything like that they don't see it as the p they just say oh so what so what? we can still walk away when they do that
how do you deal with it really?
do they come to school d do they start that school with that attitude?
so what happened to the other school the middle school or whatever you call it?
it depends it depends on which middle school they came from
yeah but then what happens is you get the kids who see them getting away with it
well of course you do you get that all the time don't you? but
but you you get decent kids that think oh dear I'm not having anything to do with them you know I'll keep out the way sometimes they get bullied don't they?
yeah I I've my product design groups are year nines apart from one student who just will not do anything
he'll be negative towards me so I'm feeling
you'd be so bored wouldn't you if they're not gonna join in and I don't understand that

I don't need it so I'm not going to do it but you're not following the rules you're not doing this you're not doing the other you haven't given me forewarning marks now I don't need to give you forewarning marks because I spoke to my head of department because you're not working that I'm going to move you to an area where you can work yeah but that's creating that's that's putting me down that is isn't it? so I'm I'm feeling I'm getting negative vibes about it so I'm not going to do anything
and all I want to do really is just laugh
that's that's the really weird thing you see it's it's the respect has gone now hasn't it? the respect for anybody in authority is gone you know in in that
yeah ah it we don't we don't have any sanctions
no well you can't touch them for a start can you?
no you can't do anything like that but we have no it's I've got a lad who shouldn't be at the school alright? he is really severe erm
no what's the other one there's Asperger's there's another one
no erm everything is everything has to be explained in unless it's clear it is a it is a form of Asperger's on the other on the one end of the spectrum
but he is dangerous he is physically dangerous
ain't that one who had the knife is it?
no no this is a year seven lad he's the one that I had to physically restrain a couple of months ago
when he got that kid round the neck and was strangling him
right he should not be in school
well they used to have special schools for them sort of people didn't they?
yeah he shouldn't be he kicked a lad today he kicked him cos this lad said something

he then smacked the kid on the on his back because he said something and this lad said well what did you do that for? well you were being mean to me no I was just we were telling you how you were being to us and you didn't like it so you hit out
there's no reasoning with them them sort of people is there?
no reason at all and it and it's going all the way th and you can you can see why some of it is where it is but he is danger he is going to hurt somebody
now I have sent emails off saying that this person should not be in school
as a head of year as a form tutor as a class teacher this student is not safe to be in school
wait until something's really serious and then
yeah yeah and it's why isn't something been done about it?
why hasn't something been done about it
ah there's some weird weirdy people about
why hasn't there something been done about it
and yes I mean yesterday I was out on the field watching them lunch time on lunch time duty outside this lad got upset because he got hit by the ball by the football
he was standing behind the goals talking
and he got hit three times and the third time he picked the ball and he picked it up and he kicked it in the opposite direction
so I pulled him over he says he's aiming at me

and I just went you are standing in the goal area talking you're standing behind the goal area people are playing football they're going to kick and it's going to go in and you're going to get hit he's doing it on purpose doing it on purpose
and this was another lad and he couldn't see just couldn't see past that he was on
make you wonder where their head is doesn't it? you know what how they're thinking
you know o other morning other morning all the kids were checked coming into school

other morning every kid was checked coming into school making certain they've got their planner making certain they've got a pen got a pencil they've got a ruler right? you don't you shouldn't have to do that but that's what happened from the second from the second week in the head says I'm not having that I'm not having that because she wanted to morning meetings with her SLT cos it was SLT that wanted to do it
so she said every member of staff had to have a box of equipment in their classroom I never collected my box of equipment cos I always keep pens and pencils
if a kid hasn't got one never made a song and dance about it there you go

hand it me back at the end I've r I've now run out can I have mi they've all gone but I haven't but I haven't had my box of pens pencils and rulers I had my equipment so how come they've all gone? my box should still be there waiting for me
and it was like well but we've given it to other people because they've run out
so yeah so that means that members of staff are not taking ownership of what we're giving out they're not collecting it back in they're not

they don't have desks and things like that at
